title: Basic Health Insurance Plan
terms_and_conditions: This basic health insurance plan provides essential health coverage at an affordable premium. The plan covers hospitalization expenses, emergency medical services, and basic doctor visits. Coverage includes inpatient hospital stays with a maximum of 30 days per year. Outpatient services are covered up to $10,000 per year. The policy includes a $2,500 annual deductible, after which 70% of covered expenses are reimbursed. The maximum out-of-pocket expense is $7,500 per year. Prescription medications are covered with a co-pay of $20 for generic drugs and $50 for brand-name drugs. Preventive care services such as annual physicals and immunizations are covered with no deductible. The policy does not cover pre-existing conditions for the first 24 months. Maternity care is not included in the basic plan. Mental health services are limited to 10 visits per year. The policy excludes coverage for cosmetic procedures, alternative medicine, and experimental treatments. Emergency services are covered within the United States only. The policy is available for individuals only, with family coverage available as an add-on option. Coverage limits include a maximum of $250,000 per year for all medical expenses.
